mdRecord.dcterms:title: School of Medicine, Fourth Year Class, 1945-1946
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Holsinger's Studio (Charlottesville, Va.)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Class of 1946. Identified (L to R): First row: Frank Kimball Abbott, Leon Ashby Adams, Thomas Henry Alphin, Lane Ameen, Thomas Alred Anderson, Jr., Frank McFaden Blanton, Paul Paine Bourjaily, Royce Lee Brown, David Staats Burnet, James Joseph Bushnell, Gilbert Sadler Campbell, Jr., William Everett Carter, Harry Duffield Cox Second row: Geoffrey William Curwen, Arthur Ebbert, Jr., Walter Lee Evans, Jr., Thomas Hancock Garth, Sam Dixon Graham, George Walter Hambrick, Jr., Gunyon Mitchell Harrison, Jacquelin Marshall Harrison, William Henry Harrison, Robert William Hartley, Wayland Jackson Hayes Third row: Malcolm Alexander Holliday, Jack Warren Hollowell, Ruth Wade Holmboe, Mark Edgar Holt, Jr., James Byron Hutcheson, III, Eugene Rucker Johnson, Homer Rodeheaver Justis, Bernard Herman Kasinoff, Hyman Charles Kessler, Howard Israel Kruger, Morris Arthur Lambdin Fourth row: Jospeh Hyman Marko, Dennis Parfrement McCarty, Walter Copley McLean, Charles Wesley Merritt, Herbert Nicholas Munhall, Jr., Philip Foster Murray, Lewis Benton Newman, William Whitehurst Old, III, Earl Tracy Owen, Wesley Calhoun Palmes, Jr., Edmund Cape Payne, Jr. Samuel Randolph Penn Fifth row: Lula Johnson Power, Robert Lee Price, William Edmond Rabil, Emmett Francis Reese, III, Robert Legare Reeves, Walter Stevens Ridgway, II, Benito Benjamin Rish, Milton Lewis Rosenberg, Russell Arthur Salton, Herbert Ralph Silverman, Raymond Herbert Stokes, Paul Shafer Stonesifer, Jr. Sixth row: John Alan Stough, Sullivan, Oscar Andreas Thorup, Jr., Robert Bocock Wilkins, Charles William Wilson, Morton Charles Wilson
